mapper.insert: insert into refund(buyer_nick, nick, oid, refund_fee, rid, seller_nick, status, tid, user_id, created) values(#{buyer_nick}, #{nick}, #{oid}, #{refund_fee}, #{rid}, #{seller_nick}, #{status}, #{tid}, #{user_id}, now())

insert into order2(tid, goods_id, title, pic_path, sku_id, quantity, price, discount, weight, payment, status, created) values(#{tid}, #{goods_id}, #{title}, #{pic_path}, #{sku_id}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{weight}, #{payment}, #{status}, now())
mapper.update: update trade2 set seller_memo=#{memo}, modified=#{modified} where id=#{tradeId}
update trade2 set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update order2 set status=#{status} where tid=#{tid} and id=#{id}
update trade2 set state=#{state}, city=#{city}, district=#{district}, address=#{address}, mobile=#{mobile}, phone=#{phone}, postcode=#{zip}, name=#{name}, modified=#{modified} where id=#{tradeId}
